meta.description:
We find ourselves at the brink of war that we all agree could be our last. While the talking heads in the U.S. Corporation Federal Gov't stoke conflict in Europe, Tommy imagines an easy way out. END FIAT! BEFORE IT ENDS US.
This is the latest painting in the Bitcoin War Bonds collection.
Started as a live painting at the second-annual HODLween in Charlotte, NC on October 21, 2023 and finished days later at block height #813659.
Painted using mixed media such as spray paints, gouache, solid oil sticks, oil pastel sticks, acrylic paint markers, and Sign Painters' ONESHOT® (the same yellow and red from the original BITCOIN WAR BONDS painting).
Signed on verso.
Includes Coinkite® Satschip affixed to the back of the canvas holding ENDFIAT, the 1/1 edition Counterparty token referencing on-chain image of the painting (Ordinals). Satschip PIN will be transferred to the buyer.
Also includes official Bitcoin War Bonds paper COA.
Ordinal inscription NOT INCLUDED, only the original painting and ENDFIAT token are included in this auction.
This painting is unframed.
Buyer pays shipping from Nashville, TN, USA.
